name: BugOut
description: In this Modern Day Survival Simulator you will be faced with surviving in the Appalachian mountains while you prepare for an apocalyptic event. Hunt gather, build, explore and trade to get what you need to survive, but keep up with whats going on, its about to get really bad in the world, will you be prepared, Come and experience BugOut.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: I5 3.2ghz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB video card Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or Better Processor: I7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: 6GB Video Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
